title: Missing Xayah and Rakan Icon
body: Gifted a friend Xayah on the 24th so I know I made it before the event deadline. I've even seen people who gifted the day after me have the icon now. I've waited patiently but I believe its been to weeks now and just wondering where the icon is. Help?

replies.body: There were a lot of eligible accounts, so it took a bit of time and some players saw them before others.  I looked into this for you and verified eligibility.  The icons's been added to your account.  :D
Porocles can you please check my account because I have yet to receive the new icon after gifting my friend xayah. Thanks
